title: Wrong input video framerate readings (r_frame_rate/ avg_frame_rate)
body:
## Component Versions Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version. - **Video2X release version**: 4.8.1 & 4.7.0 - **Upscaler version**: Waifu2x-caffe - **GUI version**: 2.8.1 & 2.8.0 - **CLI version**: don't know :-( ## Symptom Output video is faster. Player ends at 00:09 and the original video has 00:17. Output video still shows 17secs in File Explorer, but the video ends at the 9s mark and audio continues. Original video has: 12,05 FPS Output video has: 25,08 FPS What did I do wrong? Thank you. ## Error Log or Screenshots (I'm uploading info about 4.8.1 output file, because the only thing that changed between 4.7.0 is bitrate)
Original/Input (MP4 version):

``` { "streams": [ { "index": 0, "codec_name": "h264", "codec_long_name": "H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10", "profile": "Constrained Baseline", "codec_type": "video", "codec_time_base": "23333/562240", "codec_tag_string": "avc1", "codec_tag": "0x31637661", "width": 320, "height": 200, "coded_width": 320, "coded_height": 208, "closed_captions": 0, "has_b_frames": 0, "sample_aspect_ratio": "1:1", "display_aspect_ratio": "8:5", "pix_fmt": "yuv420p", "level": 32, "chroma_location": "left", "refs": 1, "is_avc": "true", "nal_length_size": "4", "r_frame_rate": "289/12", "avg_frame_rate": "281120/23333", "time_base": "1/12048", "start_pts": 0, "start_time": "0.000000", "duration_ts": 209996, "duration": "17.429947", "bit_rate": "477466", "bits_per_raw_sample": "8", "nb_frames": "210", "disposition": { "default": 1, "dub": 0, "original": 0, "comment": 0, "lyrics": 0, "karaoke": 0, "forced": 0, "hearing_impaired": 0, "visual_impaired": 0, "clean_effects": 0, "attached_pic": 0, "timed_thumbnails": 0 }, "tags": { "creation_time": "2021-03-27T00:08:54.000000Z", "language": "und", "handler_name": "VideoHandler", "encoder": "AVC Coding" } }, { "index": 1, "codec_name": "aac", "codec_long_name": "AAC (Advanced Audio Coding)", "profile": "LC", "codec_type": "audio", "codec_time_base": "1/44100", "codec_tag_string": "mp4a", "codec_tag": "0x6134706d", "sample_fmt": "fltp", "sample_rate": "44100", "channels": 1, "channel_layout": "mono", "bits_per_sample": 0, "r_frame_rate": "0/0", "avg_frame_rate": "0/0", "time_base": "1/44100", "start_pts": 0, "start_time": "0.000000", "duration_ts": 769023, "duration": "17.438163", "bit_rate": "194032", "max_bit_rate": "192000", "nb_frames": "751", "disposition": { "default": 1, "dub": 0, "original": 0, "comment": 0, "lyrics": 0, "karaoke": 0, "forced": 0, "hearing_impaired": 0, "visual_impaired": 0, "clean_effects": 0, "attached_pic": 0, "timed_thumbnails": 0 }, "tags": { "creation_time": "2021-03-27T00:08:54.000000Z", "language": "und", "handler_name": "SoundHandler" } } ```

Output video (double framerate issue):

``` { "streams": [ { "index": 0, "codec_name": "h264", "codec_long_name": "H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10", "profile": "High", "codec_type": "video", "codec_time_base": "27901/1344000", "codec_tag_string": "avc1", "codec_tag": "0x31637661", "width": 1920, "height": 1200, "coded_width": 1920, "coded_height": 1200, "closed_captions": 0, "has_b_frames": 2, "pix_fmt": "yuv420p", "level": 50, "chroma_location": "left", "refs": 1, "is_avc": "true", "nal_length_size": "4", "r_frame_rate": "289/12", "avg_frame_rate": "672000/27901", "time_base": "1/16000", "start_pts": 0, "start_time": "0.000000", "duration_ts": 139504, "duration": "8.719000", "bit_rate": "2830106", "bits_per_raw_sample": "8", "nb_frames": "210", "disposition": { "default": 1, "dub": 0, "original": 0, "comment": 0, "lyrics": 0, "karaoke": 0, "forced": 0, "hearing_impaired": 0, "visual_impaired": 0, "clean_effects": 0, "attached_pic": 0, "timed_thumbnails": 0 }, "tags": { "language": "und", "handler_name": "VideoHandler" } }, { "index": 1, "codec_name": "aac", "codec_long_name": "AAC (Advanced Audio Coding)", "profile": "LC", "codec_type": "audio", "codec_time_base": "1/44100", "codec_tag_string": "mp4a", "codec_tag": "0x6134706d", "sample_fmt": "fltp", "sample_rate": "44100", "channels": 1, "channel_layout": "mono", "bits_per_sample": 0, "r_frame_rate": "0/0", "avg_frame_rate": "0/0", "time_base": "1/44100", "start_pts": 0, "start_time": "0.000000", "duration_ts": 769024, "duration": "17.438186", "bit_rate": "194032", "max_bit_rate": "194032", "nb_frames": "751", "disposition": { "default": 1, "dub": 0, "original": 0, "comment": 0, "lyrics": 0, "karaoke": 0, "forced": 0, "hearing_impaired": 0, "visual_impaired": 0, "clean_effects": 0, "attached_pic": 0, "timed_thumbnails": 0 }, "tags": { "language": "und", "handler_name": "SoundHandler" } } ```

SMACKER (originally original video :D)

``` { "streams": [ { "index": 0, "codec_name": "smackvideo", "codec_long_name": "Smacker video", "codec_type": "video", "codec_time_base": "0/1", "codec_tag_string": "SMK2", "codec_tag": "0x324b4d53", "width": 320, "height": 200, "coded_width": 320, "coded_height": 200, "closed_captions": 0, "has_b_frames": 0, "pix_fmt": "pal8", "level": -99, "refs": 1, "r_frame_rate": "1000/83", "avg_frame_rate": "0/0", "time_base": "83/1000", "start_pts": 0, "start_time": "0.000000", "duration_ts": 210, "duration": "17.430000", "disposition": { "default": 0, "dub": 0, "original": 0, "comment": 0, "lyrics": 0, "karaoke": 0, "forced": 0, "hearing_impaired": 0, "visual_impaired": 0, "clean_effects": 0, "attached_pic": 0, "timed_thumbnails": 0 } }, { "index": 1, "codec_name": "smackaudio", "codec_long_name": "Smacker audio", "codec_type": "audio", "codec_time_base": "1/22050", "codec_tag_string": "SMKA", "codec_tag": "0x414b4d53", "sample_fmt": "s16", "sample_rate": "22050", "channels": 1, "channel_layout": "mono", "bits_per_sample": 0, "r_frame_rate": "0/0", "avg_frame_rate": "0/0", "time_base": "1/44100", "start_pts": 0, "start_time": "0.000000", "disposition": { "default": 0, "dub": 0, "original": 0, "comment": 0, "lyrics": 0, "karaoke": 0, "forced": 0, "hearing_impaired": 0, "visual_impaired": 0, "clean_effects": 0, "attached_pic": 0, "timed_thumbnails": 0 } } ```
